title: The feeling when...
body: You get a S- on Trundle and a hextech chest, you're very excited to see what's in there and you get a champion shard for... Trundle.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Right? Finally got a chest, it had been a rough few weeks. Go to open the chest and it's freaking champion shard for {{champion:126}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
